content.label: I really love this game, but there is a glitch with the vase cards. Instead of being the normal size, they cover the entire screen, and I canâ€™t see anything else. Please fix this so I can keep playing your awesome game!

Its a great game with lots of ending including a hidden one, i will not spoil it but if yuo want to really win you will need your wits and even if your not the witty type its a lot of fun!

title.label: Love this one and Her Majesty

content.label: please make one for a Prince and a Princess!!!!
A very simple but well-made game with endless replayability.

title.label: Very original idea, great time killer

content.label: A fun time waster through the day, gameplay is challenging but not overbearing. I love the fact that the purpose of the game is to make everyone happy, but not giving to much power to one party, as it puts you in the mentality of what  a real dictator / king would be thinking.
Ok so this is pretty scary I hate the x eyes even though I donâ€™t have this game I like your characters and  the style is pretty cool
I have had this game for a while and it is one of the best games ever

This game is not something that is really even thatâ€™s interesting. All you do is try to figure out a balance of all the attributes but here is no plot/actual strategy to it. I was expecting this to be more complex than it is. Not worth the money

This game is great I love but it would be better if there were more to it like a pet or the game can give the character items.
Hope you make more updates.

title.label: Probably one of the worst games Iâ€™ve ever played

content.label: This is a game for masochists. You have very little control (two options) and no information about the consequences of your actions. I can see the devs sniggering behind our backs as they torment us. Maybe thatâ€™s what some people are into? Not for me.
Good good it is very fun and I love it it is also a little silly actually really silly would recommend
What happen ?

It is impossible to figure out the results of any action or recover from any decision. The questions posed are too vague and decisions you are asked to make donâ€™t come with enough Information to assess pro and con. Played a few hours and deleted in disgust. There is nothing clever here.

This game is enjoyable if you know what youâ€™re getting into (read professional online reviews about it first). Personally, I think it works best if you play in short spurts here and there, when you have a few minutes, see how far you can go, and donâ€™t take it too seriously. Maybe youâ€™ll get far, maybe you wonâ€™t, but itâ€™s fun either way. Certainly better than a plain solitaire card game, which can also be repetitive but is fun in short spurts. Iâ€™m glad I purchased this game.

title.label: Ridiculous... and not in a good way

content.label: If it werenâ€™t for some mild humor every once in a while... nah forget it. One star. Decisions are pointless. The main drive of this game is to be funny, but it is goofy and pointless at best. Oh and frustrating to try to make any sense of how to accomplish anything.  Might as well be swiping blind.

title.label: I love this game so much

content.label: This game is amazing the only thing is it can get a little... hectic but other then that this game is amazing and I would recommend it and shut up haters stop saying itâ€™s â€œtoo complicatedâ€ or â€œthis game is dumbâ€ because thatâ€™s just a ton of bs (bull ****) this game has amazing story line but the one thing is the ending is a little unoriginal like itâ€™s an obvious ending â€œdeath canâ€™t take something thatâ€™s already deadâ€ like make it a little better and can you make a animated part like make a new ending then a cut scene for it like yeah it might ruin a little bit of the originality but itâ€™ll be cool like â€œbreaking tradition and doing something dumbâ€ but thatâ€™s all and this game is amazing and you really have to think about unlike Other her games (Minecraft) so this game is awesome and Iâ€™d recommend it

The text cuts off when in vertical mode, have to turn the phone horizontally to actually read the text
Havenâ€™t tried to play the game in months. Canâ€™t get it past opening screen on iPhone XR. Support site in store doesnâ€™t work. Game hasnâ€™t been updated in 10 months. Not sure what the issue is.

title.label: Remember enjoying this on my phone but...

content.label: Canâ€™t be played in portrait on an iPad for some strange reason

First of all I just redownloaded loaded the game and I completed the game for the good ending killing the devil but one thing just saying it was over 100 years and my FRIEND never came not once so I got one of the bad endings.... so just when that comes make it guaranteed I guess

This is honestly the best game I have ever downloaded on any device besides papers please. Reigns has a fantastic art style with a good theme. The only complaint with the game is the add ons you get in the bottom right sometimes donâ€™t work ESPECIALLY the cathedral that thing is legit broke it says it keeps the people from becoming too powerful and the church from becoming too week. It really doesnâ€™t though other then that though it is an amazing game highly recommended.

If you keep all 4 bars in the middle sometimes Cedric Brandon will throw a huge party that you canâ€™t decide not to attend. The party always ends with the king getting drunk and drowning or eating too much and choking. Sort of annoying when everything is going well and then the game kills you for it.

I canâ€™t believe I paid for this lousy excuse of a game. This shottily put together piece of crap contains 0 entertaining plot progression, frequent infinite loops during scenarios due to poor programming, and is overall a disgrace to mobile gaming. And if youâ€™ve seen mobile gaming recently, then you should now realize what a disappointing piece of trash that this â€œgameâ€ is. I can not believe a game this awful has found such success on the App Store.

I donâ€™t want to spoil too much about the game in case you know nothing, but itâ€™s great. Just...better to enter it with a mindset where youâ€™re prepared to laugh at yourself/your failures. If you can do that, I think youâ€™ll love it

While the idea of the game is really quite solid, I find myself wishing there was more to it for the price. I keep getting the pop-ups between kings that advertise the spin off variants of this game which makes me feel like instead of putting more time into updating this game, they might have abandoned making any content for it in favor of creating more variants and reselling the game. 

Just know this game will become repetitive and isnâ€™t designed to last for many hours. If you are looking for a quick, digestible game and are considering it, this sounds like the game for you.

This game has some interesting aspects but you don't really have a lot of control of what happens through your choices; One game, I decided I would just swipe left, no matter what, and I set a high score.

Iâ€™ve been playing for a while and i absolutely love it! The only problem i have is with saving my progress. The game only saves after the king has died. Please add a way to save your progress mid-reign.

Love this game so much! Itâ€™s great for someone whoâ€™s into old European history!! Honestly l just wished that as time moved on, real life events would happen in the game (Industrial Revolution, Introduction of Modern Technology, etc.). I really enjoy trying to achieve all the titles and meet every character in the game. Thanks for making it!

I donâ€™t understand how people love this game. It gets interesting for a while but eventually you see the same cards and tricks and it becomes kind of mute.

Not happy at all. Would like a refund. Donâ€™t think it was worth it.

This game is fun and I want to come back. Enough said.....(not yet)

Heres a suggestion: have important historical events or references during the game. Ex: its 1945, someone could say, â€œ The war is finally over sir!â€ Or maybe you could have an option to send troops over to a real life conflict-It would be cool when you catch them and even take part of. Course you would have to make up your own after the current year but nonetheless it would be fantabular. Yes. Fantabular. Thanks for reading my review ğŸ˜ƒ
Amazing game that I love to come back to time and time again.
Itâ€™s a game for 2 hours, then it turns into rubbish. Then it turns into a game you already figured out and there isnâ€™t any point anymore...
Would love to play additional content. Been dying for it!!

I love this game itâ€™s so addictive and fun! Iâ€™ve lasted 42 years so far and am hoping to get even farther! The only thing I would consider changing is make it so that you know how much of each items you have currently, other than that it is a fantastic game!
Really odd... go to check a text message mid-game... come immediately back and game reloads. No save spot? Should still be in memory. iPhone XR. Fix, please.
Iâ€™ve loved this game ever since I first bought it. The concept is awesome and it really makes you think. Iâ€™d recommend it to anyone whoâ€™s looking for a game.

What is there is fine, but you'll get bored after an hour or two. Cards repeat. As for the storyline and puzzle for many endings-- it's kind of convoluted and the main game is not enjoyable enough to warrant playing through enough times to solve the endings. Wish they'd spent more time on main game content.

This is a game where you swipe right or left and I have no idea how it works. So far Iâ€™ve not had much fun. One review mentioned how itâ€™s random, and I hoped that these random things would make for interesting choices. Nope, itâ€™s just random. Going to ask for a refund.
This game is great, but the app gets old after a week of play. I loved this game, but I wish that there was more detailed endings. Also, is there even a way to beat the devil??

Itâ€™s a fun game for the first hour. Making choices and seeing the new cards is great. But after that itâ€™s like the most repetitive game Iâ€™ve ever played. So much so that I donâ€™t even read the outcome, I have them all memorized so my 70 year reigns take me 3 to 4 minutes... good game, not worth 3.00 unless there are more cards added.

Overall a fun game.

I have reached the "end" in Reigns and find it a bit frustrating that if you mess up once you basically have no chance of getting at the good ending, since after you meet the devil for the last time you are set onto 3 paths only if you set yourself onto them beforehand which takes up a lot of time).
So what I'm trying to say is, it takes too much time and luck to set yourself up to the good ending (ending not death).  Mess up once and you have to restart the whole game from year 1998-2000 something all the way to the 600's, where you have to work your way up and make strategically randomized choices in the dungeon.
I think after you beat the game once you should be able to travel back to the 1800's or the 1900's with no special boosts or any cool quests unlocked.

Bug: discover a new world is impossible if you exit the app just as you discover the new world. Iâ€™ve discovered a new world a few times now but the first time I had to unexpectedly shut the app just as my explorer told me about the new land.

I love this game, literal hours into this game already and Iâ€™ve only had for two days. Only issue is Iâ€™ve discovered the frozen blood three or four times yet it doesnâ€™t leave my goals. Otherwise the games amazing
Awesome

Really a great game, itâ€™s a unique idea and itâ€™s implemented very well. Casual, but clever.  A little addictive, â€œjust one more cardâ€, at least in the first run through. 

Thatâ€™s the basis of one complaint, though. The first run is one of discovery, the second is a little more strategic because you know the effect of your decisions for most of the cards. But it would be better if there was a little more variety in which cards are available based on your decisions. There is some of that, cards get added if you choose to meet certain characters, but ideally this would happen a lot more often so thereâ€™s still more to discover in later playthroughs. I havenâ€™t â€œwonâ€ yet and Iâ€™m not sure how many more playthroughs Iâ€™m going to bother with to get there because it is becoming a little too repetitive. 

My other complaint is that progress is only saved when a new king begins his reign. Leaving the game for more than a few minutes means starting back at the beginning of that Kongâ€™s reign, which can be annoying (although I suppose it can be useful, like going back to a save). Iâ€™d like to see the option to save progress mid-reign.

I want to love this gameâ€¦ But it is to random. Your decisions donâ€™t seem to have a predictable outcome. You have no idea whether the outcome is going to be good or bad itâ€™s pretty ambiguous. Which is quite frustrating. I donâ€™t think Iâ€™ve been able to live more than 15 years in this game (which is only 15 decisions which takes about 5 minutes.) That being said it is a fun game. I just canâ€™t seem to get very far in the game sometimes just for decisions and then Iâ€™m dead and I didnâ€™t really seem like there was an obvious answer. 

Note to the developers: When you make a decision-there is a small or large circle above. It would be great to see if that circle was green or red to know how theyâ€™re going to handle it. Itâ€™s not taking the fun out of the game itâ€™s taking the frustration out.
Also it would be nice if you could add a little more variety to the sayings to help distinguish one reign from the next. 
It would be also neat if you could add a swipe up or down to add choices. Instead of just yes no right or left. Perhaps those choices could be more or less extreme. I.e. swipe up strongly agree swipe right slightly agree swipe left slightly disagree swipe down strongly disagree Or something.

title.label: Fun Plot but not the best

content.label: The plot is very fun but when i had to restart instead of continuing i got really sad i would like if the cancel would let you play again.
